verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's beauty in my brokenness,
I've got true love instead of pain
There's freedom though you've captured me,
I've got joy instead of mourning

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You give me joy
Down deep in my soul
You give me joy
Down deep in my soul

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I never been so free
Caught in your love for me
I never been more secure
Knowing your heart, Lord

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You've never known me
til you've known me filled with joy [ x2]

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
You give me joy
Down deep in my soul
You give me joy
Down deep in my soul

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
You've never seen me
til you've seen me filled with joy [ x2]
